item.description:
Movie of your choice followed by Chinese Food

Meet at the movie theatre at 1:00 pm. 

When you RSVP state in the comments which movie you would like to see. 

They all start and end around the same time.

We will split up into groups according to movie selections.

When you walk into the movie theatre, look for me on the left side of the ticket booth.

  • The Descendants - 1:45 pm (1 hr 55 min)
  • Hugo 3D - (price is more for 3D) 1:35 pm (2 hr 6 min)
  • Safe House - 1:35 pm (1 hr 55 min)
  • Gone - 1:40 pm (1 hr 35 min)
  • Wanderlust - 1:30 pm (1 hr 38 min)

After the movie, we'll meet at the Westborough Mandarin for an early dinner.

Located off Route 9 East Bound. Address is 132 Turnpike Road and is next to Ruby Tuesday's and across from Starbucks.

If you cannot make the movie, but want to join us for dinner, meet us at the restaurant around 4 pm. Ask for Jacki's table.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby where you purchase tickets.
item.name: Last Minute Movie Matinee and Chinese Food
